decision_conditions: It is considered that sufficient information has been submitted to demonstrate, on the balance of probability, that the proposed partial demolition would be permitted development and that the proposed window and door openings would not amount to development as defined in s.55(1) and s.55(2)(a)(ii) of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 and therefore the proposed works would be lawful.
